title: Dropping an online college course
context: Tell your professor you are too busy at work and must withdraw.

content.bestLine: I need to withdraw due to work commitments.

neutral.text: I need to prioritize my job
I don't have enough time for the course
I'm finding it hard to balance work and study
I have too many work commitments
I need to focus on my career

formal.text: I regret to inform you that I must withdraw
Due to unforeseen work circumstances, I must withdraw
I am compelled to prioritize my professional obligations
I must withdraw from the course due to work-related constraints
I apologize for any inconvenience, but I must withdraw
I have made the difficult decision to withdraw from the course

patterns.template: I need to [options] due to work
My work [options] has increased, so I must withdraw
patterns.meaning: providing a specific reason for withdrawing

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: Dear Professor, I regret to inform you that I must withdraw from the course due to unforeseen work circumstances.

lines.speaker: Professor
lines.text: I understand, please let me know if there's anything I can do to support you in the future.

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: Professor, I'm finding it hard to balance work and study, so I've decided to withdraw from the course.

lines.speaker: Professor
lines.text: I appreciate your honesty, let's discuss possible alternatives for the future.
